problem: RDF/XML serialization is now available in browser builds.
JSON-LD serialization is now available in browser builds.
SHACL validation is implemented in both Node and browser builds (rdf-validate-shacl).
Rollup build has minor circular dependency warnings (not critical for browser builds).
Test suite may not fully cover all edge cases for RDF-star quoted triples and annotation triples.
N3.js does not support full RDF-star features in browser builds.
